name: get_chat_restrictions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitch_api.
Tool description: Detailed API for twitch. Stream data, streamer data, chat data, streamer cards data etc.
for twitch.
API description: Fetches chat restrictions for a given Twitch channel using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

channel.description: The name of the Twitch channel to fetch chat restrictions for.
